commentAnnotations.text: Procedures specific to screening sites (only in the US) detailed in Section 8
Acetaminophen should be limited to 1000 mg/day.
Total molybdenum and PUF-molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 and subtracted from observed Day 29 profiles.
Adaptive features may be implemented at the discretion of the Investigator and do not require amendment of the protocol.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Substantial amendment to clarify US study procedures and facilitate recruitment.
